title: FS or FT: 1909-11 T206 Piedmont Wildfire Schulte Front View
author: jnorlund

posts.post_title: FS or FT: 1909-11 T206 Piedmont Wildfire Schulte Front View
posts.post_content:
Asking $75 delivered. Will also trade preferably according to my wants link. Good color (scan doesn't quite capture it), nice centering top to bottom, still 90/10 side to side. No creases and not as much rounding as a lot of them have. Call it G-VG.

[IMG]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-re8WuleyjBs/UTkuuTilZdI/AAAAAAAAA2k/h7DUP1H4djU/s512/T206%2520Schulte.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-2b8CvrgiqFo/UTkuuf7MVLI/AAAAAAAAA2k/3qSv47gNMbk/s512/T206%2520Schulte%2520back.jpg[/IMG]
